catalogue_raissonne: Hagiwara Hideo hanga sakuhin mokuroku 2013, no. 476
creditline: Gift of Sue Y.S. Kimm and Seymour Grufferman
description: abstract; green ground; red and blue flags; form with black, black, orange, and red elements; white arrow, LRQ
inscription: bottom center, in pencil:  サークス No. 6 Circus No. 6 | LRC, in pencil: 41/50
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper with mica
text: After his return from a brief teaching assignment at the University of Oregon in 1967, Hagiwara elaborated on the use of wild, swirling lines and then began to integrate forms that suggest people like in the ‘Circus’ and ‘Clown’ series.
title: Circus No. 6
